alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Upper Sevier River Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 2:38AM MST until February 03 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Upper Sevier River Valleys and Bryce Canyon Country. * WHEN...From 8 AM Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; Upper Sevier River Valleys
